Articles.Content:
I bought this game 2 weeks ago but haven't bothered to make a Forum account till now.

I love all the trial and error that comes with building this rockets. But I do have one issue with space planes, I can seem to get the flaps on the wings easily so thus I have failed at making a aircraft. Anyone else have the issue?

Try using the WSADQE keys to rotate them. You can also hold SHIFT while rotating for finer control.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome to the community Dragonoff

Have fun building spaceplanes and fly safe!
